thread.title: A special moment for Jay and Bill Haas at Presidents Cup
thread.title_full: A special moment for Jay and Bill Haas at Presidents Cup

title: A special moment for Jay and Bill Haas at Presidents Cup
text:
> Sports A special moment for Jay and Bill Haas at Presidents Cup US team captain Jay Haas, second left, and his wife Jan embrace their son Bill, right, after he won his singles match against International team player Sangmoon Bae of South Korea at the Presidents Cup golf at the Jack Nicklaus Golf Club Korea, in Incheon, South Korea, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015.(AP Photo/Ahn Young-joon)
